author: Ernst
title: Chima comic with Ice Prison
review:
These comic-books are also available in the Netherlands. A good deal if your kid likes Chima and also for other collectors.

Overall 4 bricks : A fun comic book with a small prison is a good deal, also for collectors if the book survives the kid.

Building 2 bricks : A small Ice prison with camouflage and a small catapult, not much building so 2 bricks here.

Parts 4 bricks : Several nice transparant parts usefull with other builds.

Playability 2 bricks : Standing alone not much fun of course but you can add it to all other Chima sets.

Value 5 bricks : For the price of €4,00 you get fun book for kids, which you can also collect and a small set with usefull parts so a nice deal. We try to get every new one from now.
